item.title: Episode 0: Teaser
item.itunes:title: Episode 0: Teaser
item.itunes:author: The Haskell Foundation
item.itunes:subtitle: Sub title
item.description:
Episode 0: Teaser

We are starting a new Haskell-focused podcast where we interview guests from the Haskell community. The hosts are Niki Vazou, Joachim Breitner, Andres Löh, Alejandro Serrano and Wouter Swierstra. In this teaser episode, we introduce ourselves. The first regular episode will appear very soon.

The music used is "Blue Lambda" by Donya Quick. Many thanks to Donya for giving us permission to use this track for our podcast.
